<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>global</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>sys_cb_decision_variableGetChoices</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[/** * Return the list of variables which are Choice fields in a conversation * * We have to find the fields which are Choices so we can set up Decision * Outcomes based on the values the user selected for these choices. */ function sys_cb_decision_variableGetChoices() {
// if we don't have current, we can't figure out the variable table if (typeof current == "undefined" || JSUtil.nil(current) || !current || JSUtil.nil(current.sys_id)) { gs.log("Error generating Topic choice-variable choices: current record is undefined or empty"); return; }
//answer should be automatically defined in our context when this function is called if (!answer) { gs.log("Error generating Topic choice-variable choices: answer is undefined"); return; } var variable_table = current.getValue("variable_table"); var variable_lookup = new TopicVariableAsChoice();
var choices = variable_lookup.getChoices(variable_table);
for (var i=0; i< choices.length; i++) { var choice = choices[i]; answer.add(choice.value, choice.label); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-07 14:38:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2b47a63db3333200f7d1a13816a8dc4c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>sys_cb_decision_variableGetChoices</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2b47a63db3333200f7d1a13816a8dc4c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-29 01:09:50</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2b47a63db3333200f7d1a13816a8dc4c"/> </record_update>
